resources.string: toki awen sona
o pana e sona tawa kulupa jan pi kama sona kepeken ilo lon lipu ni.
ken
o pali e nimi awen tawa jan pi kama sona
o lukin e pali lon jan pi kama sona
o toki pi sona sin tawa jan kulupu ale
tenpo ala la o pana e mani. sitelen esun en ilo lukin ike li lon ala
o kama jan pi pana sona
kulupu li lon ala.
jan pi pana sona: %s
kulupu sin
o pini e kulupu
jan %s li pini e ni
kama sin
o weka e jan pi kama sona
tenpo pini la weka
o toki kama pi tenpo sin e jan pi kama sona
o toki tawa jan pi kama sona ale.
nimi open pi lipu sona li lon pini pi toki sina. sina wile ala pana e ona.
nimi kulupu
kulupu ni li seme
jan pi kama sona en jan pi pana sona li ken lukin e ni
jan pi pana sona lon kulupu ni
o pana e nimi jan la sina pana e jan ni. linja wan li jo e nimi wan.
ona li wile wile kama jan pi pana sona.
nimi awen sin
o sitelen e nimi awen lon tenpo ni. tenpo kama la sina ken ala lukin e ni!
nimi awen: %s
o pana e nimi awen sin tawa jan pi kama sona

string.name: invitedToXByY
string.comment:
invitedToXByY
%1$s is the Class name and %2$s is the person who invited

resources.string: wile pi jan %2$s la jan ni li kama tawa %1$s
nimi lon
jan li lon selo la ona ken ala lukin e ni. sina ken sona e ni: jan ni pi kama sona li seme.
poka e jan pi kama sona

string.name: lichessProfileXCreatedForY
string.comment:
lichessProfileXCreatedForY
%1$s is the created account (nickname) %2$s is the real name of the student (only visible for the teacher)

jan pi kama sona: %1$s nimi jan: %2$s nimi awen: %3$s
